LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.label: 深海战术刀
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.description: A knife is always handy to have, and under the sea is no exception. The sharp and light blade made from plasteel is a favorite among moyo divers.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.tools.1.label: 刀刃
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Knife.tools.2.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.label: 深海动能钳
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.description: Kinetic tongs powered by gunpowder, a perfect tool for ship breakers.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.tools.0.label: 钳身
LanguageData.RedMoyo_KineticClamp.tools.1.label: 钳刃
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.label: 深海鱼叉
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.description: Deep sea alloy harpoon, capable of piercing the scales of small abyss fish.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AlloyHarpoon.tools.1.label: 鱼叉
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.label: 深海等离子鱼叉
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.description: Harpoon with heated abyss steal blade, capable of piercing the scales of most abyss creatures.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PlasmaHarpoon.tools.1.label: 鱼叉
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.label: 深海等离子太刀
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.description: An oversized katana with heated abyss steal blade,In the past such weapons were seen as a symbol of Abyss moyo's autonomous industrial capabilities.and was used by abyss forces on a large scale
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.0.label: 握把
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.1.label: 剑尖
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.2.label: 剑刃
LanguageData.Bullet_RedMoyoSmall.label: 小型等离子弹栓
LanguageData.Bullet_RedMoyoMedium.label: 等离子弹栓
LanguageData.Bullet_RedMoyoLarge.label: 重型等离子弹栓
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.label: 深海防卫手枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.description: 常见于深渊茉约装备的小型手枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Pistol.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.label: 深海防卫步枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.description: 拓展枪托的防卫手枪,经常用于狩猎与民用防卫.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_CivilAR.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.label: 深海警用手枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.description: a high-power pistol for red moyo armed forces and law enforcement agencies
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PistolPolice.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.label: 深海警用冲锋枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.description: Small submachine gun for in-cabin combat
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SMG.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.label: 深海军用步枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.description: A general-purpose assault rifle for red moyo armed forces, It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryAR.tools.1.label: 等离子刺刀
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.label: 深海精确步枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.description: A sniper rifle that can barely penetrate the shell of abyssal creatures at long distances
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitarySR.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.label: 深海重型步枪
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.description: A red moyo versioned large accelerator made to fight off the leviathans that threaten their mothership..
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.tools.0.label: 枪身
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MilitaryHeavyRifle.tools.1.label: 枪管
